name: Eclipse (itch) (Medow)
description:
A grid based card game with a day and night system. Battle your way through all the levels, unlocking new cards along the way.

Made in 10 days for GGJ 2022.

Programming and sound effects by Medow https://medow.itch.io/

Art by ThatGuyJake https://www.instagram.com/thatguyjake94/

Music by Gummerfly https://gummerfly.bandcamp.com/

Font used Smallest Pixel-7 by Style-7 https://www.dafont.com/smallest-pixel-7.font
